example.content:
sh run nat
nat (inside,any) source static obj-10.101.119.0-255.255.255.0 obj-10.101.119.0-255.255.255.0 destination static obj-10.101.200.96-255.255.255.240 obj-10.101.200.96-255.255.255.240
object network obj-10.101.119.0-255.255.255.0 nat (inside,outside) dynamic interface
object network MSA-1.2.3.4 nat (inside,outside) static interface service tcp www www

command.name: CREATE
command.operation: nat ({$params.InputInterface},{$params.OutputInterface}) source static {$params.originalSource} {$params.translatedSource}{if $params.originalDestination!="" && $params.translatedDestination!=""} destination static {$params.originalDestination} {$params.translatedDestination}{/if}{if $params.translatedService!="" && $params.originalService!=""} service {$params.originalService} {$params.translatedService}{/if}{if $params.description!=""} description {$params.description}{/if}

section.regexp: @^nat \((?<InputInterface>\S+),(?<OutputInterface>\S+)\) source static (?<originalSource>\S+) (?<translatedSource>\S+)(?: destination static (?<originalDestination>\S+) (?<translatedDestination>\S+))?(?: service (?<originalService>\S+) (?<translatedService>\S+))? description (?<description>\S+)@

command.name: DELETE
command.operation: no nat ({$natRulesObject.$object_id.InputInterface},{$natRulesObject.$object_id.OutputInterface}) source static {$natRulesObject.$object_id.originalSource} {$natRulesObject.$object_id.translatedSource}{if $natRulesObject.$object_id.originalDestination!="" && $natRulesObject.$object_id.translatedDestination!=""} destination static {$natRulesObject.$object_id.originalDestination} {$natRulesObject.$object_id.translatedDestination}{/if}{if $natRulesObject.$object_id.translatedService!="" && $natRulesObject.$object_id.originalService!=""} service {$natRulesObject.$object_id.originalService} {$natRulesObject.$object_id.translatedService}{/if}{if $params.description!=""} description {$natRulesObject.$object_id.description}{/if}

command.name: UPDATE
command.operation:
no nat ({$natRulesObject.$object_id.InputInterface},{$natRulesObject.$object_id.OutputInterface}) source static {$natRulesObject.$object_id.originalSource} {$natRulesObject.$object_id.translatedSource}{if $natRulesObject.$object_id.originalDestination!="" && $natRulesObject.$object_id.translatedDestination!=""} destination static {$natRulesObject.$object_id.originalDestination} {$natRulesObject.$object_id.translatedDestination}{/if}{if $natRulesObject.$object_id.translatedService!="" && $natRulesObject.$object_id.originalService!=""} service {$natRulesObject.$object_id.originalService} {$natRulesObject.$object_id.translatedService}{/if}{if $params.description!=""} description {$natRulesObject.$object_id.description}{/if}
nat ({$params.InputInterface},{$params.OutputInterface}) source static {$params.originalSource} {$params.translatedSource}{if $params.originalDestination!="" && $params.translatedDestination!=""} destination static {$params.originalDestination} {$params.translatedDestination}{/if}{if $params.translatedService!="" && $params.originalService!=""} service {$params.originalService} {$params.translatedService}{/if}{/if}{if $params.description!=""} description {$params.description}{/if}
